scripts.install:all: cd microservices && bash -c 'for d in */; do cd $d && echo "Installing $d" && npm install && cd ..; done'
scripts.test: cd microservices && bash -c 'for d in */; do cd $d && echo "Testing $d" && npm test && cd ..; done'
scripts.lint: cd microservices && bash -c 'for d in */; do cd $d && echo "Linting $d" && npm run lint && cd ..; done'
